headline: Jack Sheldon, 88, Big Band Trumpeter And ‘Schoolhouse Rock!’ Singer, Is Dead
abstract: He played with leading jazz musicians. He bantered with Merv Griffin. But his best-known work may have been on a children’s cartoon series.
lead_paragraph: Jack Sheldon, an accomplished jazz trumpeter who also had a successful parallel career as an actor — but whose most widely heard work may have been as a vocalist on the animated television series “Schoolhouse Rock!” — died on Dec. 27. He was 88.
